state_description: This screen displays the results of a Smart Scan, showing the amount of junk removed, security status, and performance tasks completed. It provides options to view logs and share results.
done: Smart Scan completed with junk removed, no threats found, and performance tasks completed.

enables.name: View Log
enables.description: Opens the log to view detailed information about the scan results.

enables.name: Share Results
enables.description: Allows the user to share the scan results with others.

enables.name: Start Over
enables.description: Initiates a new Smart Scan process from the beginning.
